plot: Frank lands himself in trouble when he becomes involved in organ trafficking with a group of gangsters and tries to help out his Russian girlfriend's father who is diagnosed with a kidney disease.
title: Righteous Cut
plot_es: Frank lands himself in trouble when he becomes involved in organ trafficking with a group of gangsters and tries to help out his Russian girlfriend's father who is diagnosed with a kidney disease.
plot_en: Frank lands himself in trouble when he becomes involved in organ trafficking with a group of gangsters and tries to help out his Russian girlfriend's father who is diagnosed with a kidney disease.
